They had also said that the confidence shock would cause dollarized assets to return to generate work. https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
In fact, the opposite has happened https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
What is entering the local market are dollars but as a short-term speculative investment. https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
Moreover, not only was there no massive influx of foreign direct investment ... https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
... but increased the remittance of profits by the multinationals already installed in the country. https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
The famous rain of dollars was also generated through external debt of the national State. https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
The confidence shock is not a massive influx of companies that come to invest in the country ... https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
but rather it is the entry of speculative dollars of short term (that as well as enter they also go away) https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
On the other hand, the confidence shock generated by the macrismo can be observed in the flight of capital.
From the elimination of exchange regulation (the so-called "stock") increased capital flight. https://t.co/10ZumpAywt
The shock of confidence then is external debt, short-term financial speculation ...
... increase in the remittance of profits of foreign companies, flight of capital and high interest rates. Plop.
